name: Pete's Adventures in Hat World
description: Pete's Adventures in Hat World follows the story of a magician's rabbit. Pete is placed into the magician's hat before each magic trick. When placed in the hat Pete must make his way to the exit of Hat World, a terrible land full of magicians props and evil rabbits who have been trapped while the magician was practicing his tricks. If Pete can make it into the magicians hand at the end of each level he is pulled out and freed from Hat World to bask in the applause of the audience.
